message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $105.
